misc.どの奥義魔法を唱えますか？: Which arcane spell will you cast?
misc.プロフィールを入力してください(▘文字以内): Please enter your profile (▘ characters or less)
misc.試練の洞窟前: In front of the Cave of Trials
misc.アイテム名で検索することができます。: You can search by item name.
misc.売りに出したいアイテムを持ち物から選んでください。: Select the items you want to sell from your inventory.
misc.購入したいアイテムを選んでください: Select the item you want to purchase
misc.このアイテムを合成しますか？: Do you want to synthesize this item?
misc.このアイテムを銀貨▘ Sで購入しますか？: Would you like to purchase this item with Silver Coins ▘ S?
misc.フロッグ・アイランドのサイコロ使用を優先にしました: Prioritized dice use in Frog Island
misc.追加したい「フレンド名」を入力してください: Enter the name of the friend you want to add
misc.魔法の袋の中身を整理してください: Organize the contents of your magic bag
misc.どTreasure Chestを鑑定しますか？: How do you want to identify a Treasure Chest?
misc.どれくらい短くしますか: How short do you want it?
misc.鍵があれば中に入れそうだ: If I had the key, I could get in.
misc.竜と獅子の宮殿: Palace of the Dragon and the Lion
misc.凶暴なモンスターがうろついているので採取できません: Harvesting is not possible as violent monsters are roaming around.
misc.いくつバックパックに入れますか？: How many can you fit in your backpack?
misc.以下のアイテムを倉庫に集めると、\nトルソーがプレゼントされます。:
If you collect the following items in your warehouse,
you will receive a torso as a gift.
misc.トルソーがプレゼントされました: Torso was given as a gift
misc.このアイテムを銀貨▘ Sで売りに出します。\n売れた場合の手数料は銀貨▚ Sです:
Put this item up for sale for Silver ▘ S.
If it sells, the commission will be Silver ▚ S.
misc.いくつ合成しますか？\n倉庫にあと▘個まで入れられます。:
How many would you like to combine? 
You can store up to ▘ more items in your storage.
misc.このアイテムを▘個合成しますか？: Would you like to combine ▘ of this item?
misc.アイテムを合成して、倉庫に入れました。: I combined the items and put them in storage.
misc.どのペットを飼いたいんだ？: Which pet do you want to have?
misc.夜桜のバレッタ: Valetta with Cherry Blossoms at Night
misc.このアイテムをすべて捨ててよろしいですか？: Are you sure you want to throw away all of these items?
misc.サイコロはDice Game Stageで利用できます: Dice are available on the Dice Game Stage
misc.河童がなついてきました: The kappa has become attached to me
misc.登録したいモンスターを選んでくれ。: Please select the monster you want to register.
misc.河童は野に帰りました: The kappa returned to the field

items.月と太陽の斧神: Axe God of the Moon and Sun
items.巾着入りの怪魚: Strange fish in a drawstring bag

dialog.私達は白いライオンに乗って各地を旅していた。\nある地方を旅していた時、鉱山に出:
We traveled from place to place on our white lion.
While traveling through one region, we heard rumors that men who had gone into the mines had never returned.
We defeated an evil creature lurking deep in the mines and obtained the cursed Evil Eye that turns people to stone.
We sealed this memory away in the second tower.
dialog.バックパックの説明\n\nバックパックは、持ち切れないアイテムを詰めておく袋のよ:
Backpack Description

A backpack is like a bag for storing items you can't carry.

If you have more items than you can carry, put them in your backpack.

Items in your backpack can be retrieved and used again when needed.

Item abilities that are activated simply by holding them will remain active even while they are in your backpack.

You can also combine items in your backpack to create new items.
dialog.魔法の袋の説明\n\n魔法の袋は、採取したアイテムや持ちきれなかったアイテムが、:
Magic Bag Description

The magic bag is a temporary bag that automatically stores collected items and items you were unable to carry.

When the magic bag is active, collected items will be stored in the magic bag.

This is very convenient as it eliminates the need to repeatedly organize your items during your adventure.

Click the bag image to enable or disable it.
*Even when disabled, items you were unable to carry will still be automatically stored.

Don't forget to organize your magic bag after your adventure is over.
dialog.牧場ギルドでは様々な動物を調教して、冒険者たちに配っている。\n\n牧場ギルドと:
The Farm Guild trains a variety of animals and distributes them to adventurers.

By making a contract with the Farm Guild, you become a pet owner,
and can take your pet on adventures.

By paying ▘ feeding fees, you can take your pet with you for ▚ days.
What's more, the Farm Guild will take care of your pet for free if it runs out of food.

Of course, you can also own multiple pets.
You can generally only take one pet with you on an adventure.
Pets you don't want to take with you will be kept at the Farm Guild, so you don't have to worry.

If you have a pet with you, you can continue your journey by using your pet's dice instead of your own.
This is especially recommended for solo travelers.
The larger the pet, the more dice you will recover.

When the owner rolls dice while bringing a pet,
the pet will gain experience points.
As your pet gains experience, it will level up, gaining more stamina and attack power,
and may even recover more dice.

Use the pet button to control your pet.
Press it when you're far away to call your pet.
Press it when you're close to your pet to ride it. This only applies to large animals.
Small pets may climb onto your head or shoulders.
Press the pet button again to dismount or put them down.

You can summon pets you've kept at your ranch by typing "#petname" in chat.
To summon multiple pets in succession, use the "▘" shortcut key.
Summoning will use up your pet's dice, but it will also earn you experience points and level up.
Summoning is a great skill because you don't even have to pay for food. Remember that!

The Ranch Guild sometimes gives out rare animals, so check back often.
dialog.あら、やめておくのね。\nところで、「盗賊のお守り」は知っているかしら？\n\n:
Oh, I guess I'll pass.
By the way, do you know what a Thief's Amulet is?

It's a charm that makes it easier to find treasure chests just by having it.

And the more you have, the more effective it becomes.

It's handy to keep one in your backpack.

Don't forget that you can make it with a Golden Claw.
dialog.商人ギルドでは、お客様からお預かりしたアイテムをお客様に代わって販売しております:
The Merchants Guild sells items entrusted to it by customers on their behalf.

If there is an item you would like to buy, simply search for it by name.
We will randomly select ▘ items from those currently for sale and present them to you.

If there is an item you would like to sell, please deposit it with the Merchants Guild.
You can set the price of the item as you like.

If an item sells, the Merchants Guild will take a ▚% commission (minimum ▘ S silver coins).
Speak to us at your leisure and we will report the sold items and give you the silver coins.

You can deposit up to ▚ items at a time.
You can view your deposited items at any time.
If you change your mind, you can cancel the sale.
Please feel free to use our service.
dialog.牧場ギルドへようこそ\nここに来るのが初めてなら、まずは説明を聞いてくれ: Welcome to the Farm Guild. If this is your first time here, please listen to the introduction.
dialog.お得な情報！\nアーティファクト対応サービスのプラス会員の方は、\n床屋ギルドの:
Great deal!
Plus members of artifact-enabled services
can use all of the Barber Guild's menus for free.
dialog.いらっしゃいませ。今日はどうしますか？: Welcome. What would you like to do today?
dialog.どうだいボクの上げたアイテムは役に立ったかい？: So, were the items I gave you useful?
dialog.俺は鍛冶ギルドの者だ。 どんな用事かな？: I'm from the Blacksmith's Guild. What can I do for you?
dialog.ロビーに戻りますか？\n\n\n※ キーボードのEscを連打すると確認画面を出さ:
Do you want to return to the lobby?

* You can return to the lobby without the confirmation screen appearing by repeatedly pressing Esc on your keyboard.
dialog.魔法は得意？\nやっぱり戦いには必要かしらね。:
Are you good at magic?
I guess it's necessary for battle after all.
dialog.あら、盗賊ギルドへようこそ。\n今日はどんな御用かしら？: Oh, welcome to the Thieves Guild. What can I help you with today?
dialog.あちこち飛び回って集めた大事な大事な宝箱達。\n取り逃した箱があれば譲りましょう:
I've collected these precious treasure chests by flying around all over the place.
Would you like me to sell you any chests I missed? They're hard to come by right now, so they'll be a little pricey, though.
dialog.クローゼットは、装備品をセットにして入れておく場所です。\n\n装備品を着けてお:
The closet is where you store equipment as a set.

The base on which your equipment is worn is called a torso.

You can store shirts, jackets, hats, pants, shoes, and accessories all in one place on a torso.

You can have fun dressing up your torso by swapping the equipment you're currently wearing with the equipment on your torso.

Locked torsos will be gifted to you when you collect the specified items in your storage.

Locked torsos will be added from time to time, so try to get them!

*When you gift a torso, the collected items will be moved from your storage to the torso.
dialog.銀貨▘ Sを支払って、倉庫枠を▚個拡張します。\nよろしいですか？:
I will pay ▘ S silver coins to expand my warehouse by ▚ units. 
Are you sure?
dialog.おいそこのお前！\nボク今とっても嫌いなやつがいてさ、嫌がらせをしたいんだよね。:
Hey you there!
Right now there's someone I really dislike, and I want to harass him.
For that purpose, I'd like to have some "Shining Silk of Light", but you look like you have some free time.
Bring it here!
dialog.バジリスクの巣で河童の好物が手に入るはずだぜ。\nそいつでカッパを連れてきてくれ:
You should be able to get some of Kappa's favorite food from the Basilisk's nest.
Could you bring me a Kappa with that?
dialog.ウルヴァリン装備\n\nウルヴァリンに変身した時の追加の装備品です。\n特殊なア:
Wolverine Gear

Additional equipment when transforming into Wolverine.
Using special items allows you to transform into Wolverine.
dialog.コロッサス装備\n\nコロッサスに変身した時の追加の装備品です。\n特殊なアイテ:
Colossus Gear

This is additional equipment when transforming into a Colossus.
You can transform into a Colossus by using special items.
dialog.フェニックス装備\n\nフェニックスに変身した時の追加の装備品です。\n特殊なア:
Phoenix Gear

This is additional equipment when transforming into a phoenix.
You can transform into a phoenix by using special items.
dialog.ラット装備\n\nラットに変身した時の追加の装備品です。\n特殊なアイテムを使う:
Rat Gear

Additional equipment when transformed into a rat.
Use special items to transform into a rat.
dialog.これが私が書き残す最後の石碑となる。\n私は長い眠りに就くことにした。\n君たち:
This is the final stone tablet I leave behind.
I have decided to enter into a long slumber.
If you are reading this stone tablet, it means that a threat is approaching this place.
Guardians, I ask you to defend this sanctuary at all costs.
You will be able to equip yourself in the lands sealed within the eight towers.
I have engraved on the tower doors the order in which you should visit.
Now, go, time is running out.
dialog.彼女を生き返らせる唯一の方法。それは中庭から続く地下霊廟へ安置した彼女の遺体に復:
The only way to bring her back to life is to give the Fruit of Resurrection to her body, which has been placed in the underground mausoleum connected to the courtyard.
However, during a visit to the islands known as Bird Paradise, she gave the Fruit of Resurrection to a small turtle she named Landland when she saved it.
Now, only the seed remains. It is said that the Fruit of Resurrection only bears fruit on its branches once every thousand years.
dialog.倉庫は、持ちきれなくなったアイテムを入れておく場所です。\n\n倉庫ギルドに話し:
The Storage is where you store items you can no longer carry.

You can retrieve or deposit items at any time by speaking to the Storage Guild.

Click on an item in the list to temporarily sort it.

You can change the location of items within the Storage by dragging them.

If you run out of storage space, you can expand it using silver coins.

*The sort order will not be saved.
*Items in the Storage cannot be rearranged while sorting.
dialog.それは自分でやってくれ。\n\nバックパックを使えばできるだろう？:
Do that yourself.

Can you do that with a backpack?
dialog.分解したいアイテムがあれば、俺が分解してやるぞ。\n\nアイテムを分解するには、:
If you have an item you want to dismantle, I'll dismantle it for you.

To dismantle an item, you need something called a "Synthesis Stone."
Put the item you want to dismantle and ▘ number of Synthesis Stones in your backpack,
then tell me the item you want to dismantle.

Once dismantling is complete,
the ▚ number of specified items and ▘ number of Synthesis Stones will disappear,
and the materials will remain in your backpack instead.
dialog.あら、もっと大きなバックパックが欲しいのね。\nお望み以上の物があるわよ。\n\:
Oh, you want a bigger backpack.
I have more than you needed.

The Thieves Guild has a very valuable magical backpack.
It's the same size and weight as a normal backpack,
but it has a magical chamber inside, allowing it to hold much more treasure.
Many of the most famous thieves favor these.

For ▘ S silver coins, I'll give you my magical backpack, which can hold even more.
From now on, you'll be able to fit up to ▚ items inside.

Is that okay?
dialog.あら、何か事情があるようね。\nまあ、人生いろいろあるしね。何も言わなくていいの:
Oh, it seems there's something going on.
Well, life is full of surprises, after all. You don't need to say anything.
Yes, you can change your name through dark channels.

Don't do it if you're just playing a prank, though.
You wouldn't want to be wiped from this world for doing that, would you?

Okay, let me explain in more detail.

The Thieves Guild will only change your name.
If you want to remove your friend relationships as well, that's up to you.
Of course, everything else will remain the same except for your name, so don't worry.
If you want to become a completely different person, I recommend changing your hairstyle and clothing.

You'll also need a fee of ▘ S silver coins to pay to the Thieves Guild.

Is that okay?
dialog.あらこんにちは！今私はこのへんで研究をしているの。\nでも、時期が悪くて、峠には:
Oh, hello! I'm doing some research around here right now.
But it's a bad time of year, and it seems like there are a lot of stronger monsters than usual appearing on the mountain pass.
I borrowed an item from my teacher that can tell me where monsters appear...but it's still in development, so it's a little iffy.
By the way, my teacher and I call monsters that move from place to place drift monsters.
If you're interested, try yelling "@tell me" loudly.
I'll tell you the locations of the drift monsters from here.
dialog.やぁ。君は、その、どちらの言うことが正しいと思う？: Hey, who do you think is right?
dialog.今回は魔法研究所からの依頼だ。\nマジカルパウダーというものを持ってきて欲しい。:
This time, I have a request from the Magic Research Institute.
I want you to bring me something called Magical Powder.
Magical Powder can be made from mushroom spores that can be harvested from Fungus.
Once you've placed the Magical Powder in your inventory, talk to me.
dialog.※ これはサブクエストです。何か目的が欲しいという方向けのオマケ要素です。\n※:
*This is a side quest. It's a bonus element for those who want a specific goal. 
*It will not affect the main story even if you don't accept it. 
*Paid items may be required to complete it.
dialog.私はボローニ。舞台演出家です。\n私の劇団「ボローニ歌劇団」では、次の演劇として:
I'm Bologni, a stage director.
My theater company, the Bologni Opera Company, is planning to produce "Cinderella" as our next play.
But we're missing a costume for the lead character, Cinderella.
Cinderella means "covered in ashes," right? I'd like some tattered clothes like that.
Could someone please bring me a costume like that?
dialog.私は商人のナグロフと言います。\n世界中のめずらしいものを集めて商売をしながら、:
My name is Naglof, a merchant.
I travel the world collecting and selling rare items.
...Ouch, ouch, ouch. Oops, excuse me.
The truth is, I was injured by a monster while I was traveling.
The potions I sell in my shop don't seem to be able to heal the injury.
I can't do business satisfactorily like this.
I wish there was a medicine that would completely heal the injury with just one drink...
dialog.私の名前はヴァルヴァラ。\n世界中の古代遺跡を探索している、考古学者よ。\n\n:
My name is Varvara.
I'm an archaeologist exploring ancient ruins around the world.

You look like an adventurer. You seem quite strong.
Hey, do you want to test your skills?
As an adventurer, you've probably entered the Cave of Trials.
The monsters that appear in that cave are getting in the way of my exploration.
The most troublesome ones are slimes, giant crabs, and trolls.
It doesn't matter which monsters. I'd like you to defeat a total of ▘ monsters.
dialog.少し私のわがままに付き合ってもらえる時間をくれないだろうか。\nまずは君の強さを:
Could you please put up with my selfishness for a little while?
First, I want you to show me your strength.
After you defeat the Electric Eel in Arakur, the Golden River, return here.
dialog.Moriasはやる気だぜ。俺はあいつに付いて行くことにした。\nお前もそうしたら:
Morias is motivated. I've decided to follow him.
You should do the same, I'm sure you'll agree.
Hey, let's team up. First, try to defeat Sleipnir. Let's test our strength!
dialog.すぐに大きな戦いが起こりそうな気がするから鍛えないと！どいてどいて！: I have a feeling a big battle is going to happen soon, so I need to train! Get out of the way!
dialog.こんにちは！おしゃれなそこのあなた、武器の見た目を変えたくなーい？\n私がこの時:
Hello! Hey fashionistas out there, want to change the look of your weapon?
I'll give it a seasonal look!
But this time, that's assuming you have this weapon.
Don't worry, you can change it back.
dialog.僕の話を聞きたいの？\nその前に「聖水」を持ってないかい？\n昨夜揉め事に巻き込:
Do you want to hear my story?
But first, do you have any holy water?
I got into a fight last night and got a little hurt.
dialog.我々はオルトレア地方から訪れた研究者だ。\n我々の研究を未来で役立てて欲しいため:
We are researchers visiting from the Ortorea region.
We leave stone monuments in various locations in the hope that our research will be useful in the future.

We plan to leave the next stone monument as soon as our research progresses.
If the stone monuments stop, that will mark the end of our existence.

Researchers
dialog.サイコロが足りません。\nサイコロは▘時間ごとに▚回復します。\n\n今すぐ銀貨:
You don't have enough dice.

Dice replenish every ▘hours▚.

Would you like to use a silver coin ▘S to roll the dice now?
dialog.お得な情報！\nパペットガーディアンプラス会員の方は、\nなんとすべてのペットの:
Great deal! 
Puppet Guardian Plus members
get half price on all pet food!
dialog.三つ目の塔に封印する思い出の地は、私の妻ユンが最も好きだった場所。\n生命の力が:
The place of memories to be sealed away in the third tower was my wife, Yun's favorite place.
She spoke to this jungle, brimming with the power of life, and the forest responded.
It was a scene most fitting for Yun, who loved nature and had the unrestrained spirit of an animal.
Yes, I must bring Yun back to life. I am prepared to do whatever it takes to achieve that.
dialog.おぉ若者よ、少しこのおいぼれの願いを聞いてくれないか？\n書き留めたいことが有る:
Oh young man, would you please listen to this old man's request for a moment?
I have something I'd like to write down. Could I have a few "pulps"?
If you bring them to me, I'll tell you a funny story as a reward.
dialog.私が眠りにつく前にやるべきことは、ユンが眠るこの城と、聖なる樹を守ることだ。\n:
Before I fall asleep, I must protect this castle where Yun rests, and the sacred tree.
I will use magic to make this castle, which was our home, float into the sky, along with its foundation.
However, this alone will not be enough to completely prevent intruders.
In the event that an enemy invades from the sky, I will leave a mural engraved with the souls of the guardians.
If someone were to target this place, doll guardians would emerge from the mural and protect the castle.
dialog.最後の塔には私たちの最後の戦いの場であり、ユンが命を落としたあの場所を封じた。\:
The final tower is where our final battle took place, and where Yun lost his life.
To proceed through this cursed place, you will have to fight Shasthra's experimental creatures and his guardians, the Mirage Guardians,
and the white dragon Brisaligan, Shasthra's dragon mount and strategist.
Be very careful, as the Mirage Guardians have the skills to counter the Puppet Guardians.

As you may have already realized, you who are reading this stone tablet are the Puppet Guardians, the protectors of the castle I created with magic.
If you are reading this, the wizard Shasthra is likely approaching this castle.
Fearing death, Shasthra has extended his own life to the limit with magic. He will likely seek the Fruit of Resurrection within this castle.
There is also one more thing that must not be stolen. That is the magic mirror.

The magic mirror is an artifact created by Shasthra that allows one to instantly teleport to any location.
In the past, Shasrah used this magic mirror as a despicable means of assassination, making kings the world over fear his enemies.
If we had failed to steal this mirror, the kingdom of ▘, which guards that great treasure, would have fallen to Shasrah.
I cannot lightly reveal the hiding place of the magic mirror here.

What it reflects sleeps in a transformed form. Even in this blessed land, it is something that does not exist in this heavenly sky overlooking the sea of clouds.
dialog.この塔に封印されし世界は、シャスラの峠と呼ばれる場所。\n君たちがこの城を守るた:
The world sealed within this tower is a place called Shasra Pass.
It is here that we obtained the shield known as Shasra's Magic Mirror, which you will need to defend this castle.
It was here that we fought a deadly battle with our archenemies, the vampires Lester and Millard.
They were supposedly defeated by Yun's favorite silver flute, but their vitality is incomparable to that of a human,
and we can never rest easy.
And speaking of Shasra's Magic Mirror, Shasra was a powerful wizard who lived here,
and he was none other than the one who killed Yun. The magic mirror is a powerful artifact created by him.
Shasra is said to be immortal, so no matter how many years pass, he will surely attack in pursuit of this mirror.
We have decided to hide the mirror somewhere in this castle.
dialog.私は残された種をこの城の裏庭に植えることにした。\n千年後に実を結ぶことを期待し:
I decided to plant the remaining seeds in the castle's backyard.
Hoping that they would bear fruit a thousand years from now.
I'm sure that in the distant future, this tiny life will grow to cover the entire castle, just like the sacred tree I saw back then.
I then decided to fall into a deep slumber. I will spend a thousand years cursed by the evil eye.
However, before I fall asleep, there is something I must do.
dialog.所持金\n\nこの世界で使われる銀貨の所持数を表します。\n\n銀貨を持っている:
Money

This represents the amount of silver coins used in this world.

Silver coins allow you to purchase various items and receive special services.

Start by buying a few silver coins and enjoying the game.

Click to purchase silver coins.
dialog.銀貨が必要です。\nまずは、銀貨を入手しましょう。:
You need silver coins.
First, get some silver coins.
dialog.これ以上アイテムをお預かりすることはできません。\nお預かりできるアイテムは▘個:
We are unable to store any more items.
You can only store up to ▘ items.
dialog.おっと！珍しい品をお持ちですね。\n申し訳ありませんが、このアイテムは商人ギルド:
Oops! You have a rare item.
We're sorry, but this item is not available at the Merchants Guild.
Please keep it safe.
dialog.クエストの達成を報告しますか？: Would you like to report a quest?
dialog.おお、連れてきてくれたんかよ！\nやっぱり気味悪いぜ・・・。\n\nこいつぁ、俺:
Oh, you brought it! 
That's still creepy... 

This is my way of saying thank you. 
It also has fire retardant properties.
dialog.おお、またきてくれたんかよ。\n\n打ち上げ花火の用意をしていかねぇとだぜ。\n:
Oh, you've come again.

I need to get ready for the fireworks.

First, could you please bring me the gunpowder we need for the fireworks?

I'd like some.

Apparently, it can be synthesized from saltpeter found in places like basilisk nests.

I'll thank you if you bring it to me.
dialog.バジリスクの巣なんかにある硝石から、火薬が作れるはずだぜ。 \n▘個くれぇ持って:
You should be able to make gunpowder from the saltpeter found in places like basilisk nests. 
▘ Could you bring me some?
dialog.ほう、モンスターを手なずけたのか。\nせっかくだから牧場ギルドに登録するか？\n:
Oh, so you've tamed the monster.
Maybe I should register it with the farm guild while I'm at it?
If I pay for its food and register it with the farm guild, it won't disappear without me noticing,
and even if it goes down, the guild will take care of it, so I don't have to worry.
dialog.今連れているペットを牧場に預けるんだな？: Are you leaving your current pet at the farm?
dialog.すまないが、名前はカタカナのみで頼む: Sorry, but please write your name in katakana only.
dialog.名前は「カッパ」でいいんだな？\n\n▘日間のペットのエサ代は、銀貨▚ Sだ。\:
Is it okay to name him "Kappa"?

The cost of feeding your pet for ▘ days is S silver coins▚.
If your pet runs out of food, the Farm Guild will keep it for you, so feel free to come and pick it up anytime.

So, would you like to become a pet owner?
dialog.おお、すまねぇな。\n\nこいつぁ、俺からの礼だぜ。\n使うと防火の作用もあるぜ:
Oh, sorry.

This is my way of saying thank you.

It also has fire prevention properties.
dialog.銀冠花火玉を入手しました: Obtained a Silver Crown Fireworks Ball
dialog.おお、待ってたぜ。\n\nまた協力してくれねぇか。\n花火には包む紙が必要だから:
Oh, I've been waiting for this.

Would you mind helping me out again?

I need paper to wrap the fireworks.

Next, could you bring me some scraps of Japanese paper?

I'd like some.

You should be able to get some from the shikigami that appear in the basilisk nest.

If you bring them to me, I'll thank you.
dialog.バジリスクの巣に出現してやがる「式神」から和紙の切れ端が採れるはずだぜ。\nあれ:
You should be able to get scraps of washi paper from the Shikigami that appear in the Basilisk's nest. 
If you have any, please give me ▘ pieces.
dialog.こんにちは。このへんの人？\n僕は今旅をしていてここへたどり着いたところなんだけ:
Hello. Anyone around here?
I'm currently traveling and have just arrived here.
It looks like there will be a lot to see and do, so I'm looking forward to it.
I'd like to go on an adventure, but I'm worried that my equipment might not be enough.
You seem to be used to adventuring, so I was wondering if you could help me out.

Armor is essential for protection, right?
If you have any steel armor, would you mind giving it to me?
dialog.魔法の王国Splendor Mythosへようこそ。\n\n初めての訪問者は、広:
Welcome to the magical kingdom of Splendor Mythos.

First-time visitors should head up the road north of the plaza
to the Royal Palace to pay their respects.

King Morias
dialog.やあ、どこかで会ったことがあるかな？\n一つ頼みたいことがあるのだが、興味はある:
Hello, have I met you somewhere before?
I'd like to ask you a favor, would you be interested?

Oh, so it's called Frog Island.
First, I'd like to know how strong you are.
I'd like you to defeat ▘ Garm in the Cave of Trials.
We'll talk after that.
dialog.Moriasに話を聞いたかい？\nあのマリスがどうやら悪い事を企んでいるんだって:
Have you talked to Morias?
I hear that Maris is up to no good. Isn't that scary?

I'm currently gathering steel to help Morias.
Would you like to help me?
dialog.最近色々な噂が流れているわね。何か悪いことが起こるかもしれないし備えるに越したこ: There have been a lot of rumors floating around lately. Something bad might happen, so it's best to be prepared. I've been collecting "blue eggshells," could I have some?

item_desc.トルニーア地方の東部へ移動できる不思議な宝玉。\n (売買不可):
A mysterious gem that can transport you to the eastern part of the Tornia region.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.ロングボウを強化した弓。扱いやすさと威力が向上している。: An improved version of the longbow, with improved handling and power.
item_desc.手軽に装備できる盾。初心者にも向いている。: A shield that can be easily equipped. Suitable for beginners.
item_desc.アックスを鍛えなおした強力な斧。: A powerful axe that has been reforged.
item_desc.手軽に装備できるヘルム。初心者にも向いている。: A helmet that can be easily equipped. Suitable for beginners.
item_desc.手軽に装備できるマント。初心者にも向いている。: A cape that can be easily equipped. Suitable for beginners.
item_desc.手軽に装備できる服。初心者にも向いている。: Clothing that can be easily equipped. Suitable for beginners.
item_desc.手軽に装備できるブーツ。初心者にも向いている。: These boots are easy to equip and are suitable for beginners.
item_desc.割れたサファイアのかけら。微弱ながら水の魔力を帯びている。: A broken sapphire fragment. It is imbued with the weak magical power of water.
item_desc.ラット用の帽子。水の攻撃から守られる。\n (売買不可):
A hat for rats. Protects against water attacks.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.特殊に強化された着色ガラスを組み合わせて作られた、綺麗で神々しさも感じる大剣。ガ: A beautiful and divine greatsword made from a combination of specially strengthened colored glass. The light reflected from the glass allows the user to bestow life onto their opponent.
item_desc.パワーを秘めたパンツ。身に着けた者にみなぎる体力を与える。\n (売買不可):
Pants imbued with power. Imparts overflowing stamina to the wearer.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.炎、水、雷の▘つの力を融合して作りだされた指輪。炎上、眠り、麻痺の脅威を軽減させ:
A ring created by fusing the powers of fire, water, and lightning. It has the power to reduce the threat of burning, sleep, and paralysis.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.闇、水、雷の▘つの力を融合して作りだされた指輪。恐怖、眠り、麻痺の脅威を軽減させ:
A ring created by fusing the powers of darkness, water, and lightning. It has the power to reduce the threat of fear, sleep, and paralysis.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.持っていると不幸や恐怖心から守ってくれるという美しいクリスタルのお守り。: A beautiful crystal amulet that is said to protect the wearer from misfortune and fear.
item_desc.夜空で美しく輝く三日月の形を模した大剣。雷の魔力を帯びた刀身を見つめるだけでも目: A large sword modeled after a crescent moon that shines beautifully in the night sky. Just gazing at the blade imbued with the magical power of lightning will make you dizzy.
item_desc.木の繊維を加工して抽出された材料。柔軟で丈夫な上に、とても軽い。一本の木からあま: A material extracted from processed tree fibers. It is flexible, strong, and very light. It is a valuable product because not much can be extracted from a single tree.
item_desc.敵を突き刺すために作られた武器。: A weapon designed to pierce enemies.
item_desc.捕虜や動物を殺さずに痛めつけるための道具。: A tool used to inflict pain on prisoners or animals without killing them.
item_desc.記念に配られた特別なダイス。使えるダイスを全回復するか、合成で家具にもできる。\:
A special dice given as a commemorative gift. It can be used to fully restore all usable dice, or synthesized into furniture. 
It disappears once used.
item_desc.古の時代、ある強大な神が自らの愛馬を模して刀匠に鍛えさせ生まれた天器。手にすれば: In ancient times, a powerful god had a swordsmith forge a sword modeled after his beloved horse, creating a heavenly weapon. When wielded, it protects the wearer from fire and petrification, and allows them to move swiftly as if they had extra legs.
item_desc.光と水の攻撃力を封じ込めたバングル。装備すると、腕に魔法のタトゥーが出現し、頻繁:
A bangle that contains the offensive powers of light and water. When equipped, a magical tattoo appears on the arm, allowing for more frequent critical hits. Furthermore, it can inflict fatal damage on opponents weak to light and water.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.敵の全神経を破壊し燃やしつくす業火と消滅をつかさどる杖。: A staff that controls the hellfire and annihilation that destroys and burns all of the enemy's nerves.
item_desc.光と雷の攻撃力を封じ込めたバングル。装備すると、腕に魔法のタトゥーが出現し、頻繁:
A bangle imbued with the offensive powers of light and lightning. When equipped, a magical tattoo appears on the arm, allowing for more frequent critical hits. Furthermore, it can inflict fatal damage on opponents weak to light and lightning.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.豊穣の女神に捧げられた世にも美しいサンダル。活力に溢れ、火属性のダメージにも強く: These beautiful sandals, dedicated to the Goddess of Fertility, are full of vitality and are resistant to fire damage.
item_desc.サンタクロースのスノードーム。魔力を込めると、雪とともにサンタクロースが現れ通り: A Santa Claus snow globe. When you infuse it with magic, Santa Claus will appear and pass through with the snow. The recipient may become cold and dizzy. (Not for sale or purchase)
item_desc.レイスが宿り姿を変えたメイス。使う者が戦闘モードになるとさらにその姿を変える。: A mace that has been transformed by a wraith. When the wielder enters combat mode, its appearance changes even further.
item_desc.煌めく光で敵の目眩を誘い、時に炎上状態に陥らせることもある戦士のセスタス。: Cestvs is a warrior who uses dazzling light to blind his enemies and sometimes even set them on fire.
item_desc.めったに見ることのできない、竜が流す涙そのもの。伝説の竜の秘宝を作り出すことがで: These are the tears of a dragon, a rare sight. They are said to be able to create the legendary dragon's treasure. Drinking them will instantly restore your strength.
item_desc.名斧と呼ばれるにふさわしい逸品。完全に戦闘用に作られている。: A masterpiece worthy of being called a masterpiece axe. It is made entirely for combat.
item_desc.雷のパワーを込めて作られた棍棒。これで叩くといい音がでそうな気がする。: A club made with the power of thunder. I feel like it would make a great sound if I hit something with it.
item_desc.雷の魔力を帯びた武器と一緒に装備すると、雷のダメージを増幅させる効果を持つ魔法の:
A magical armlet that amplifies lightning damage when equipped with a weapon imbued with lightning magic. The higher the owner's lightning attribute percentage, the greater the effect.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.シルクでできた高価なズボン。軽くて通気性が良い。: Expensive trousers made of silk. Lightweight and breathable.
item_desc.身につけるものに竜王の心臓を授けるといわれる強力なアーティファクト。人間をはるか:
A powerful artifact said to bestow the heart of the Dragon King on its wearer, granting them physical strength far beyond that of a human.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.どこにでもある普通の石ころ。: An ordinary stone that can be found anywhere.
item_desc.的に当てるための銃。子供でも使いこなせる。: A gun for hitting targets. Even a child can use it.
item_desc.遂に捕らわれた月と太陽は、永劫の輪より降りた傍から一振りの斧へと姿を変えた。決し: Finally, the captured moon and sun descended from the eternal ring and transformed into a single axe. The user gained the agility of a never-sleeping galloping horse and strong resistance to fire-elemental attacks.
item_desc.噴火する火山の魔力が宿った魔のナイフ。鞘は脚に取り付けるようになっている。火砕流: This demonic knife is imbued with the magical power of an erupting volcano. The sheath is attached to the leg. It slices through the target at the speed of a pyroclastic flow flowing down the slope, leaving the opponent in a state of flames.
item_desc.手軽に装備できる剣。それなりに使えるので初心者にも向いている。: A sword that can be easily equipped. It is quite usable, so it is suitable for beginners.
item_desc.▘％オフで倉庫を▚枠拡張することができるお得なクーポン。: A great coupon that allows you to expand your warehouse with ▘% off.
item_desc.コボルトの顔型に打ちあがる花火玉。鑑賞用で一度使うとなくなるが、防火の作用もある: A firework ball shaped like a kobold's face. It is a mysterious item that is meant for display purposes and disappears after one use, but also acts as a fire prevention device.
item_desc.不死鳥のエンブレムによって復活した古の斧。火属性のダメージを与える。: An ancient axe resurrected by the Phoenix Emblem. Deals fire damage.
item_desc.小花が咲くような花火が打ちあがる花火玉。鑑賞用で一度使うとなくなるが、長く防火の: A firework ball that shoots up small, blooming fireworks. It is a mysterious item that is meant for viewing and disappears after one use, but also has the effect of preventing fires for a long time.
item_desc.明日絶対晴れてほしい時に着ると願いが叶うかもしれないシンプルな服。\n (売買不:
A simple outfit that may make your wish come true if you wear it when you really hope for sunny weather tomorrow.
(Not for sale)
item_desc.魔力を持つ者が読むことで、天界から聖なる光を呼びだし、邪悪な敵を浄化する魔法書。: When read by someone with magical powers, this spellbook summons holy light from heaven and purifies evil enemies. Its power can be activated any number of times until the magical power runs out.
item_desc.垂れ下がる様に落ちてくる花火玉。鑑賞用で一度使うとなくなるが、防火の作用もある不: A firework ball that hangs down. It is a mysterious item that is meant for viewing and disappears after one use, but also acts as a fire prevention device.
item_desc.マジックベインの名で知られる、魔法のパンジャ。身につけると、犬系のモンスターに追: Known as Magicbane, this magical panja allows the wearer to deal extra damage to dog-type monsters.
item_desc.雷と自然の攻撃力を封じ込めたバングル。装備すると、腕に魔法のタトゥーが出現し、稀:
A bangle that contains the attack powers of lightning and nature. When equipped, a magical tattoo appears on the arm, granting a rare chance of a critical hit. Furthermore, it can inflict fatal damage on opponents weak to lightning and nature.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.夏を感じるオーブ。使うと誰も知らない秘密の海岸移動できる不思議な宝玉。一人用。\: An orb that lets you feel the summer. A mysterious gem that transports you to a secret beach no one knows about. For single use. (Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.浄化と健康の祈りが込められた魔法のハートロケットペンダント。魔力を込めると自分と:
A magical heart locket pendant imbued with prayers for purification and health. When infused with magical power, it can remove all abnormalities from you and your allies, and instantly restore your stamina.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.古の預言者たちが身に纏っていたズボン。地形を味方に付ける特別な力があった。全ての:
These pants were worn by ancient prophets. They have the special power to turn the terrain to your advantage. They also make you slightly more resistant to all elemental damage.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.より闇の増幅効果を高めるよう強化された魔法のアームレット。さらに、水のダメージを:
A magical armlet that has been strengthened to further enhance the dark amplification effect. It also now has the added effect of amplifying water damage.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.海と癒しの力の象徴である鯨を模した水瓶。魔力を注入すると、使用者に絶大な癒しを与: A whale-shaped water bottle, a symbol of the sea and healing power. When infused with magical power, it provides immense healing to the user.
item_desc.光、自然、水の▘つの魔法によって作り出されたお守り。身につけると、その▚つのダメ:
An amulet created from the magic of light, nature, and water. When worn, it reduces damage from those three elements and increases stamina.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.火・水・雷の攻撃力を封じ込めた巨狼の秘宝。装備すると、低確率だがクリティカルヒッ:
A treasure of the great wolf that contains the attack powers of fire, water, and lightning. When equipped, it grants a low chance of landing a critical hit. Furthermore, it can inflict fatal damage on opponents weak to fire, water, or lightning.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.多大なパワーを秘めたサシェ。身に着けた者にみなぎる体力を与える。\n (売買不可:
A sachet containing immense power. It bestows immense stamina on the wearer.
(Cannot be sold or bought)
item_desc.精密な細工が施された鍵。晩夏祭りの季節イベント中、バジリスクの巣に出現した大狸神: A meticulously crafted key. During the Late Summer Festival seasonal event, it can be used to open the gate leading to the Great Tanuki Shrine that appears in the Basilisk's Nest any number of times. It is also effective when placed in your backpack.
item_desc.愛の魔法がかけられている帽子。魔力を込めると、自身から愛の炎が巻き上がる。魔力が:
A hat enchanted with the magic of love. When filled with magical power, flames of love will rise from within. You can activate this power as many times as you like until the magic runs out.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.魔力を持つ者が弾くことで、美しい音色で魅了し、流星が現れる和琴。魔力が尽きるまで:
When played by someone with magical powers, this wagoto captivates with its beautiful tone and causes shooting stars to appear. Its power can be activated as many times as needed until the magical power runs out.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.満月の夜にコウモリが活動する姿を模して作られた、二面性を持つ斧。: A dual-purpose axe, modeled after a bat's activity on a full moon night.
item_desc.胸からつま先まですべてをカバーするスパッツ。女剣士が好んで身につける。: Spats that cover everything from chest to toes. A favorite of female swordsmen.
item_desc.わずかに青白く発光する謎の金属で作られた兜。海底の戦士たちが使っていたという。: A helmet made from a mysterious metal that emits a faint pale blue light. It is said to have been used by undersea warriors.
item_desc.黄金のガントレットにトルマリンをはめ込んだもの。持ち主の腕に、強い雷の力が宿ると: A golden gauntlet set with tourmaline. It is said that the wearer's arm is endowed with the powerful power of lightning. Opponents tremble in fear at the sight of the gem.
item_desc.頭がい骨の形をしたマスク。お化けに仮装するために使われる。: A skull-shaped mask used to disguise oneself as a ghost.
item_desc.芸術の域に達した斧。世界に数本しかなく、使う者を選ぶ。美しい形状を保ちながらも最: An axe that has reached the level of art. There are only a few in the world, and it is a weapon that chooses its wielder. It maintains its beautiful shape while boasting the strongest combat capabilities.
item_desc.名弓を集め、一つに作りなおした剛弓。: A powerful bow made by collecting famous bows and remaking them into one.
item_desc.魔力を持つ者が力をこめると、稲妻を落とすことができる匣。魔力が尽きるまで何度でも:
A box that can summon lightning when filled with magical energy by those with magical powers. Its power can be activated any number of times until the magical energy runs out.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.甘くておいしい、食べると元気が出る南国の果物。バショウ科の多年草で、デンプン、繊: A sweet and delicious tropical fruit that gives you energy when you eat it. A perennial plant of the Musaceae family, it is rich in starch, fiber, vitamin A, and more. It is enjoyed by people of all ages, from children to adults, and is a popular snack in some areas, even if it is expensive.
item_desc.柄にウサギの装飾があしらわれた短剣。部屋で走り回るウサギのように素早く攻撃し、敵: A dagger with a rabbit-shaped handle. Attacks as quickly as a rabbit running around the room, freezing enemies.
item_desc.天の川を渡るためのオーブ。\n (売買不可):
An orb for crossing the Milky Way.
(Not for sale)
item_desc.トルニーア地方の南部へ移動できる不思議な宝玉。\n (売買不可):
A mysterious gem that can transport you to the southern part of the Tornia region.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.光と自然の力を集めて作られた魔法の盾。攻める者から光と自然の攻撃を守り、魔力をこ:
A magical shield made from the power of light and nature. It protects from light and natural attacks from attackers, and when infused with magical power, a mammoth's trunk will appear and strike the target, inflicting dizziness and poison status ailments.
(Cannot be bought or sold)
item_desc.その昔位の高い山伏が身につけていたという、巨大な数珠。襲ってくる相手には武器とし: A giant rosary that was once worn by high-ranking mountain ascetics. It can also be used as a weapon against attackers.
